data.title: M*A*S*H: Season 6, Episode 4 script
data.meta_description: Transcript for Tv Show M*A*S*H - Season 6 Episode 4 - War of Nerves
data.text:
M*A*S*H (1972â€“1983): Season 6, Episode 4 - War of Nerves - full transcript

Sidney Freedman feels depressed over Tom, a young soldier, who blames Sidney for his injuries because Sidney sent him back into combat. The 4077th members light a bonfire to release their stress.
